body_html:
Let's see how this works. We have a PR triage, but I bet it'll be relaxing as hell to have a reviewer recommendation. We can also play with the config. I wish it had an option to not @mention people, but just say their names instead (as a recommendation for a human).

If this catches on, we may make a PR.

If this catches on, we may make a PR.
body:
Let's see how this works. We have a PR triage, but I bet it'll be relaxing as hell to have a reviewer recommendation. We can also play with the config. I wish it had an option to not @mention people, but just say their names instead (as a recommendation for a human). 

If this catches on, we may make a PR.
